description:
Have you ever wanted to confess something to the world but were too afraid to speak your mind? Have you ever wanted to hear people's deepest secrets? Then Confessions is the app for you!

Post your confessions completely anonymously (guaranteed!). Say exactly what you think, feel, and dream without any consequences.

Get your kicks reading the secrets & thoughts of complete strangers! Be prepared to be shocked, disgusted, and horrified at the thoughts that bounce around in the heads of your fellow humans. Read the sappy feelings of love and shed a tear. 

Get Confessions today, and feel better in knowing there are other sick, twisted, nosey people, just like you!

This update includes the ability to view the latest confessions.
